patterns: How can I apply for admission?
Tell me about the admission procedure
How to get admission in St. Xavier's College?
responses: You can find detailed information about the admission process on our Admissions and Courses page: https://xaviers.edu/main/admissions-and-courses

patterns: Programs available at St. Xavier's College
responses: St. Xavier's College offers a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate courses. You can explore the full list here: https://xaviers.ac/#/courses

patterns: How can I contact the college?
Phone number of St. Xavier's College
responses: You can contact us at +91-22-22620661 or via email at webadmin@xaviers.edu. Our address is 5, Mahapalika Marg, Mumbai- 400001, Maharashtra.
You can find information about our faculty members on the Faculty page: https://xaviers.ac/#/faculty

patterns: Recent happenings at St. Xavier's College
responses: Stay updated with our latest news and events here: https://xaviers.ac/#/news-events
Our library offers a vast collection of resources. For more details, visit: https://xaviers.ac/#/library
Yes, we offer hostel facilities. You can find more information and apply here: https://xaviers.ac/#/hostel
The fee structure varies by course. Please refer to the Admissions and Courses page for detailed information: https://xaviers.edu/main/admissions-and-courses
St. Xavier's College offers various scholarships and financial aid programs. Details can be found here: https://xaviers.ac/#/scholarships
